Genevera Allen is a Professor of [Statistics](https://stat.columbia.edu/) at [Columbia University](https://www.columbia.edu/).  She is also a member of the [Center for Theoretical Neuroscience](https://ctn.zuckermaninstitute.columbia.edu/), the [Zuckerman Institute for Mind, Brain, and Behavior](https://zuckermaninstitute.columbia.edu/), and the [Irving Institute for Cancer Dynamics](https://cancerdynamics.columbia.edu/). Prior to joining Columbia, Dr. Allen spent fourteen years at [Rice University](https://www.rice.edu/) where she founded and directed Rice's data science education center, informally known as the [Rice D2K Lab](https://d2k.rice.edu/).  

Dr. Allenâ€™s research develops new **statistical machine learning** tools to help people make **reliable discoveries from data**. 


#### Research Interests
- Unsupervised Learning
